title: Executive Order 8358-Revocation of Executive Order No. 4308 of September 23, 1925, Withdrawing Public Lands for Classification
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 4308 of September 23, 1925, temporarily withdrawing public lands in Arizona for classification, pending examination by the Smithsonian Institution of certain Indian ruins located thereon, is hereby revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8358-Revocation of Executive Order No. 4308 of September 23, 1925, Withdrawing Public Lands for Classification Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371960
